TypeSignature.Value: public class CredentialCache : System.Collections.IEnumerable, System.Net.ICredentials, System.Net.ICredentialsByHost
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CredentialCache extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Net.ICredentials, class System.Net.ICredentialsByHost
Public Class CredentialCache Implements ICredentials, ICredentialsByHost, IEnumerable
public ref class CredentialCache : System::Collections::IEnumerable, System::Net::ICredentials, System::Net::ICredentialsByHost

summary.span: 提供多個認證的儲存區。

span.span: Provides storage for multiple credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會儲存多個網際網路資源的認證。The class stores credentials for multiple Internet resources. 需要存取多個資源的應用程式可以儲存在那些資源的認證再提供適當的認證至網際網路資源時所需的執行個體。Applications that need to access multiple resources can store the credentials for those resources in a instance that then provides the proper set of credentials to the Internet resource when required. 當方法呼叫，它會比較統一資源識別元 (URI) 而且與提供的驗證型別儲存在快取，並傳回第一組相符的認證。When the method is called, it compares the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and authentication type provided with those stored in the cache and returns the first set of credentials that match. 屬性包含目前的安全性內容的系統認證。The property contains the system credentials of the current security context. 用戶端應用程式，這些代表的使用者名稱、 密碼和網域目前已登入的使用者。For client applications, these represent the user name, password, and domain of the user who is currently logged in. ASP.NET 應用程式，預設認證是登入的使用者或使用者被模擬的使用者認證。For ASP.NET applications, the default credentials are the user credentials of the logged-in user or the user being impersonated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會初始化與多個安全性認證會使用這些認證與。The following code example initializes a with multiple security credentials and uses those credentials with a . [!code-cpp[Classic CredentialCache.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic CredentialCache.Add Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CredentialCache.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic CredentialCache.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CredentialCache.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic CredentialCache.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Adds a instance to the credential cache.

summary.span: 將要搭配 SMTP 以外其他通訊協定使用的 執行個體加入至認證快取，並使其與統一資源識別元 (URI) 和驗證通訊協定產生關聯。

span.span: Adds a instance to the credential cache for use with protocols other than SMTP and associates it with a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefix and authentication protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法上的芳鄰SMTP 入以外的通訊協定搭配使用的執行個體。The method places a instance for use with protocols other than SMTP into the . 快取中加入它的順序儲存的認證。The cache stores credentials in the order in which they are added to it. 當呼叫方法時，它會傳回適當的比對執行個體。When the method is called, it returns the proper matching instance. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會初始化與多個安全性認證會使用這些認證與。The following code example initializes a with multiple security credentials and uses those credentials with a . [!code-cpp[Classic CredentialCache.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic CredentialCache.Add Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CredentialCache.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic CredentialCache.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CredentialCache.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic CredentialCache.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將要搭配 Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) 使用的 執行個體加入至認證快取，並使其與主機電腦、連接埠和驗證通訊協定產生關聯。

span.span: Adds a instance for use with SMTP to the credential cache and associates it with a host computer, port, and authentication protocol.

summary.span: 使用此方法加入的認證只適用於 SMTP。

span.span: Credentials added using this method are valid for SMTP only.

summary.span: 這個方法不適用於 HTTP 或 FTP 要求。

span.span: This method does not work for HTTP or FTP requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將SMTP 入搭配使用的執行個體。This method places a instance for use with SMTP into the . 快取中加入它的順序儲存的認證。The cache stores credentials in the order in which they are added to it. 當呼叫方法時，它會傳回藉由比對選取的執行個體`host`， `port`，和`authType`。When the method is called, it returns a instance that is selected by matching the `host`, `port`, and `authType`. 不區分大小進行比較。The comparison is done case-insensitively. 支援的值`authType`為"NTLM"、"Digest"、"Kerberos"和"Negotiate"。The supported values for `authType` are "NTLM", "Digest", "Kerberos", and "Negotiate". 使用此方法加入的認證，才有效 SMTP 搭配使用。Credentials added with this method are only valid for use with SMTP. 這個方法無法用於 HTTP 或 FTP 通訊協定。This method does not work for HTTP or FTP protocols. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會初始化多個安全性認證來與 SMTP 搭配使用，並使用的其中一個認證與。The following code example initializes a with multiple security credentials for use with SMTP and uses one of those credentials with a . [!code-cpp[NCL_Credential.Cache.Add_SMTP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCL_Credential.Cache.Add_SMTP/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCL_Credential.Cache.Add_SMTP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCL_Credential.Cache.Add_SMTP/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCL_Credential.Cache.Add_SMTP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCL_Credential.Cache.Add_SMTP/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得應用程式的系統認證。

span.span: Gets the system credentials of the application.
An that represents the system credentials of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性只適用於 NTLM、 交涉和 Kerberos 驗證。The property applies only to NTLM, negotiate, and Kerberos-based authentication. 代表應用程式執行所在的目前安全性內容的系統認證。 represents the system credentials for the current security context in which the application is running. 用戶端應用程式中，這些通常是使用者執行應用程式的 Windows 認證 （使用者名稱、 密碼和網域）。For a client-side application, these are usually the Windows credentials (user name, password, and domain) of the user running the application. ASP.NET 應用程式，預設認證是使用者認證登入的使用者或正在模擬的使用者。For ASP.NET applications, the default credentials are the user credentials of the logged-in user, or the user being impersonated. 若要取得的認證為執行個體，使用屬性。To get the credentials as a instance, use the property. 支援的值`authType`為"NTLM"、"Digest"、"Kerberos"和"Negotiate"。The supported values for `authType` are "NTLM", "Digest", "Kerberos", and "Negotiate". 這個方法無法用於 HTTP 或 FTP 通訊協定。This method does not work for HTTP or FTP protocols. > [!NOTE] > 所傳回的執行個體無法用來檢視使用者名稱、 密碼或網域的目前安全性內容。The instance returned by cannot be used to view the user name, password, or domain of the current security context. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來取得系統認證的應用程式。The following code example uses the property to get the system credentials of the application. [!code-cpp[CredentialCache_DefaultCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_DefaultCredentials/CPP/credentialcache_defaultcredentials.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CredentialCache_DefaultCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_DefaultCredentials/CS/credentialcache_defaultcredentials.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CredentialCache_DefaultCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_DefaultCredentials/VB/credentialcache_defaultcredentials.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得目前安全性內容的網路認證。

span.span: Gets the network credentials of the current security context.

value.span: ，表示目前使用者或應用程式的網路認證。

span.span: An that represents the network credentials of the current user or application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的認證屬性是只適用於 NTLM、 交涉和 Kerberos 驗證。The credentials returned by the property is applicable only for NTLM, negotiate, and Kerberos-based authentication. 所傳回的認證代表應用程式執行所在的目前安全性內容的驗證認證。The credentials returned by represents the authentication credentials for the current security context in which the application is running. 用戶端應用程式中，這些通常是使用者執行應用程式的 Windows 認證 （使用者名稱、 密碼和網域）。For a client-side application, these are usually the Windows credentials (user name, password, and domain) of the user running the application. ASP.NET 應用程式，預設網路認證是使用者認證登入的使用者或正在模擬的使用者。For ASP.NET applications, the default network credentials are the user credentials of the logged-in user, or the user being impersonated.

permission.span: 用於讀取使用者名稱的環境變數。

span.span: for reading the USERNAME environment variable.
Associated enumeration:

span.span: Returns a instance associated with a specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) or host, and authentication type.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.NetworkCredential GetCredential (Uri uriPrefix, string authType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.NetworkCredential GetCredential(class System.Uri uriPrefix, string authType) cil managed
Public Function GetCredential (uriPrefix As Uri, authType As String) As NetworkCredential
public: virtual System::Net::NetworkCredential ^ GetCredential(Uri ^ uriPrefix, System::String ^ authType);

param.name: uriPrefix
param.span: ，指定認證允許存取之資源的 URI 前置詞。

span.span: A that specifies the URI prefix of the resources that the credential grants access to.

param.name: authType
param.span: 驗證配置，由在 uriPrefix 中指名的資源所使用。

span.span: The authentication scheme used by the resource named in uriPrefix.

summary.span: 傳回與所指定之統一資源識別項 (URI) 和驗證類型關聯的 執行個體。

span.span: Returns the instance associated with the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and authentication type.

returns.span: ，或 (如果在快取中沒有相符的認證)。

span.span: A or, if there is no matching credential in the cache, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會搜尋並傳回指定的 URI 和授權類型的執行個體。The method searches the and returns the instance for the specified URI and authorization type. 如果包含沒有相符的執行個體，`null`傳回。If the contains no matching instance, `null` is returned. 使用快取中的最長相符的 URI 前置詞，來決定要傳回的授權類型的認證集。 uses the longest matching URI prefix in the cache to determine which set of credentials to return for an authorization type. 下表顯示範例。The following table shows examples. |URI 前置詞URI Prefix|符合Matches| |----------------|-------------| |`http://www.contoso.com/portal/news.htm`|在特定的 Web 網頁的要求`news.htm`。Requests for the specific Web page `news.htm`.| |`http://www.contoso.com/portal/`|要求中的所有內容`portal`以外的路徑， `news.htm`。Requests for all content in the `portal` path, except the page `news.htm`.| |`http://www.contoso.com/`|在所有資源要求`www.contoso.com`，但不包括在`portal`路徑。Requests for all resources at `www.contoso.com`, except those in the `portal` path.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法以傳回與指定的 URI 和驗證類型相關聯的執行個體。The following code example uses the method to return the instance associated with the specified URI and authentication type. [!code-cpp[CredentialCache_GetCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_GetCredential/CPP/credentialcache_getcredential.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CredentialCache_GetCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_GetCredential/CS/credentialcache_getcredential.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CredentialCache_GetCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_GetCredential/VB/credentialcache_getcredential.vb#1)]

param.name: uriPrefix

summary.span: 從快取刪除 執行個體，如果它與所指定之統一資源識別元 (URI) 和驗證通訊協定關聯。

span.span: Deletes a instance from the cache if it is associated with the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefix and authentication protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會移除的執行個體如果指定的 URI 前置詞和驗證通訊協定符合與認證相關聯。This method removes a instance from the if the specified URI prefix and authentication protocol match those associated with the credential. 多個呼叫方法具有相同沒有作用。Multiple calls to the method for the same have no effect. 如果`authType`是`null`或`uriPrefix`是`null`，或沒有相符的認證已找到快取中，這個方法不會執行任何動作。If `authType` is `null` or `uriPrefix` is `null`, or no matching credential is found in the cache, this method does nothing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個方法來刪除從快取的執行個體。The following code example uses this method to delete a instance from the cache. [!code-cpp[CredentialCache_Add_Remove#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_Add_Remove/CPP/credentialcache_add_remove.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CredentialCache_Add_Remove#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_Add_Remove/CS/credentialcache_add_remove.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CredentialCache_Add_Remove#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_Add_Remove/VB/credentialcache_add_remove.vb#3)]

span.span: A that identifies the host computer.

param.name: authenticationType
param.span: ，識別連接到「主機」時所使用的驗證配置。

summary.span: 從快取刪除 執行個體，如果它與所指定之主機、連接埠和驗證通訊協定關聯。

span.span: Deletes a instance from the cache if it is associated with the specified host, port, and authentication protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會移除的執行個體如果指定的主機、 連接埠，以及驗證通訊協定符合與認證相關聯。This method removes a instance from the if the specified host, port, and authentication protocol match those associated with the credential. 多個呼叫方法具有相同沒有作用。Multiple calls to the method for the same have no effect. 如果`authType`是`null`或`uriPrefix`是`null`，或沒有相符的認證已找到快取中，這個方法不會執行任何動作。If `authType` is `null` or `uriPrefix` is `null`, or no matching credential is found in the cache, this method does nothing.
